gui_help_text¶

author: Arne Hoelter

Everything that is placed on the ‘Help’ Tab can be written or found in this module.

gui_help_text.help_text()[source]¶

Strings in html-format that are placed in Div widget in Rows to be displayed in the Tabs of the ‘Help’ page.

Returns

help_tabs – Tabs widget that contains all data of ‘Help’ page.

Return type

obj

Next topic

gui_helper
